body: honestly, the reuploading of this one is less annoying then the "Erona" one. Why the hell do NTR's have SO MANY RE-UPLOADS and for the SAME THING (Not a new chapter but I think I saw FIVE uploads of the SAME CHAPTER in quick succession, makes me think their desperate to make NTR haters love NTR by driving them crazy with RE-UPLOADING THEM OR SOMETHING)
Stop uploading this over and over again.............
